core.name: Nebula Spectra
core.description:
Leader Bonus.
Nebula Spectra: Team gains 30% Crit DMG. Teams with 3 BIO-type characters gain 20% to Total DMG Multiplier.

subskills.name: Nebula Spectra
subskills.description: Team gains 40% Crit DMG. Teams with 3 BIO-type characters gain 26% to Total DMG Multiplier.

core.name: Combo: Gunstorm
core.description:
Unleashes a spinning gun kata after 3 consecutive shots.
Spinning Kata: 8x28% ATK of AOE Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Switch Skill: Nova Cyclone
subskills.description: Switch entry unleashes a powerful Gunstorm flurry. Switch entry and QTE attacks against enemies knocked airborne gain 50.0% Total DMG Multiplier.

subskills.name: Gemini Vortex
subskills.description: During Combo ATK, mash the [ATK] button to unleash up to 6 more Combo ATKs.

subskills.name: Planetary Spin
subskills.description: Gunstorm deals additional 40.0% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies in close range. Triggers 4 times each round.

subskills.name: Drizzle of Light
subskills.description: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 20/50/100, gain 5.00%/10.00%/15.00% Crit Rate respectively.

subskills.name: Shock Resonance
subskills.description: Attacks against stunned or paralyzed enemies gain 150.0% Physical and Elemental DMG.

core.name: Gungnir Execution
core.description:
Leaps into the air and summons the Valkyrie heavy cannon to annihilate the enemy.
Scientific Cannon: Up to 2500% ATK of Physical DMG.SP Cost: 100

subskills.name: QTE: S.W.O.L.
subskills.description: QTE: Triggers when an enemy is knocked airborne, dealing up to 50x40.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Energy Burst
subskills.description: Final hit of Ultimate consumes all remaining SP to additionally deal 26.0% ATK of Physical DMG times the amount of SP consumed.

subskills.name: Aftermath
subskills.description: Triggers a 5.0s Time Fracture at the end of the Ultimate.

core.name: Time Fracture
core.description:
Quickly cartwheels away to evade enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row
Time Fracture: Triggers upon a 3s Ultimate Evasion; CD: 20s.
Time Distortion: Valkyrie's Move Speed is significantly enhanced during Time Fracture triggered by her own evasion.

subskills.name: Temporal Boom
subskills.description: Time Fracture can be triggered by a non-ultimate evasion, but the duration is shortened to 3.0s. The duration of Time Fracture triggered by an Ultimate Evasion is extended to 3.0s.

subskills.name: Nebula Core
subskills.description: For every enemy affected by Time Slow, character attacks gain 5.0% Physical DMG. Max stacks: 10.

subskills.name: Time Bender
subskills.description: Ultimate Evasion's effects can be triggered for 1 more time(s). Cooldown is decreased by 2.0s.

core.name: Gyrodrive Kata
core.description:
Fires 4 shots in rapid succession.
1st Shot: 100% ATK of Physical DMG
2nd Shot: 100% ATK of Physical DMG
3rd Shot: 150% ATK of Physical DMG
4th Shot: 100%x2 ATK of scatter shot Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Comet Flechette
subskills.description: Turns the first 3 shots into scatter shots, dealing 100.0% ATK of AOE Physical DMG. Damage dealt decreases with increasing distance from target.

subskills.name: Aerolite Burst
subskills.description: Scatter shots deal additional Physical DMG equal to 70.0% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies in close range and recover a small amount of SP.
